member.name: T:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Svc.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration of the NExT Service Host.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Svc.Configuration.DBServer
member.summary: Encrypted DB server name. If this is a zero-length string, other DB-related fields are ignored, and the configuration is set from the file.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Svc.Configuration.DBConfigQuery
member.summary: If empty, the configuration is read from the file; otherwise, it specifies the scalar query that retrieves the configuration from the DB.
member.remarks: The string _ID_MACHINE_ is replaced with the id of the machine running the query.

member.name: F:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Svc.Configuration.PollingIntervalMS
member.summary: The status of all services is checked periodically after this time interval (in milliseconds).

member.name: M:SySal.Services.NExTSrvHost_Svc.NExTSrvHost.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.
